titleStmt.title: The Lord Marquesse of Dorchesters letter to the Lord Roos with the Lord Roos's answer thereunto : whereunto is added the reasons why the Lord Marquesse of Dorchester published his letter of the 25 of Febr. 1659 dated the 13 of the same moneth : with his answer to the Lord Roos in his letter.
titleStmt.author: Dorchester, Henry Pierrepont, Marquis of, 1606-1680.
Rutland, John Manners, Duke of, 1638-1711.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
